960100.name: Layer by Layer
960100.description:
Layer by Layer is a single player game set in a solar-punk world where you pilot an over-sized 3D printer to help people!

You will set out to the wider world beyond your quaint village, helping communities across the globe with your 3D printing skills. 

Features

  • Start a thriving enterprise. As you gain renown as a skilled 3D Printer Pilot, word will spread that you can help different communities solve their problems.

  • Visit different biomes in a solar-punk world. This world has learned and healed from the past. Be a part of a society that has learned to use technology in harmony with the environment.

  • Pilot a 3D Printer and solve problems, or complete challenges! Gain more renown by getting high scores. Finish prints quickly or efficiently in order to make clients happy.
